trans-unit.source: (Bear in mind that the reflog may be purged, so this isn't guaranteed to work.)
trans-unit.target: (请记住,回录可能会被清除,所以这并不保证能正常工作)。

trans-unit.source: (The following was tried for the official Linux repository)
trans-unit.target: (以下为官方的Linux版本库试用过)

trans-unit.source: (nice pendant of git remote set-url origin <newurl>)
trans-unit.target: （ git remote set-url origin <newurl> 的漂亮吊坠）

trans-unit.source: $ git remote -v will print all remotes (not what you want). You want origin right?
trans-unit.target: $ git remote -v 将打印所有遥控器（不是您想要的）。 您想要原产地吗？

trans-unit.source: $ git remote show origin much better, shows only origin but takes too long (tested on git version 1.8.1.msysgit.1).
trans-unit.target: $ git remote show origin 更好，仅显示 origin 但花费的时间太长（在git版本1.8.1.msysgit.1上测试）。

trans-unit.source: (Merged by Junio C Hamano -- gitster -- in commit e437cbd, 05 Oct 2015):
trans-unit.target: （由Junio C gitster - gitster-在commit e437cbd中合并 ，2015年10月5日） ：

trans-unit.source: A simple way is to open the .git/config file:
trans-unit.target: 一种简单的方法是打开 .git/config 文件：

trans-unit.source: Add a get-url subcommand to be able to query both as well as a way to get all configured URLs.
trans-unit.target: 添加 get-url 子命令，以便能够同时查询和获取所有已配置URL的方式。

trans-unit.source: After reloading the terminal, you can then just type:
trans-unit.target: 重装终端后,然后就可以直接打字了。

trans-unit.source: As pointed out by @Jefromi, this option was added in v1.7.5 and not documented until v1.7.12.2 (2012-09).
trans-unit.target: 正如@Jefromi指出的那样，此选项已在v1.7.5中添加，直到v1.7.12.2 （2012-09）才被记录 。

trans-unit.source: Before git 2.7, you had:
trans-unit.target: 在git 2.7之前,你有。

trans-unit.source: By default, only the first URL is listed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,只列出第一个URL。

trans-unit.source: Configurations for insteadOf and pushInsteadOf are expanded here.
trans-unit.target: 在此扩展了 insteadOf 和 pushInsteadOf 的配置。

trans-unit.source: Expand the URL of the given remote repository taking into account any "url.<base>.insteadOf" config setting (See git-config(1)) and exit without talking to the remote.
trans-unit.target: 考虑任何 "url.<base>.insteadOf" 配置设置（请参见 git-config(1) ），展开给定远程存储库的URL，然后不与远程对话进行退出。

trans-unit.source: Expanding insteadOf is a part of ls-remote --url and there is no way to expand pushInsteadOf as well.
trans-unit.target: 扩展 insteadOf 是 ls-remote --url 的一部分，也没有办法扩展 pushInsteadOf 。

trans-unit.source: For me, this is the easier way (less typing):
trans-unit.target: 对我来说,这是最简单的方法(少打字)。

trans-unit.source: For more useful variables there's:
trans-unit.target: 对于更有用的变量有:

trans-unit.source: Here are a few more of my frequently used ones:
trans-unit.target: 这里再给大家介绍几个我经常使用的。

trans-unit.source: How can I determine the URL that a local Git repository was originally cloned from
trans-unit.target: 如何确定本地 Git 仓库的 URL 是克隆自一个本地 Git 仓库的 URL?

trans-unit.source: I also highly recommend git-extras which has a git infocommand which provides much more detailed information on the remote and local branches.
trans-unit.target: 我还强烈建议git-extras使用 git info 命令 ，该命令可提供有关远程和本地分支的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: I basically use:
trans-unit.target: 我基本上是用。

trans-unit.source: I can never remember all the parameters to Git commands, so I just put an alias in the ~/.gitconfig file that makes more sense to me, so I can remember it, and it results in less typing:
trans-unit.target: 我永远无法记住Git命令的所有参数，因此我只是在 ~/.gitconfig 文件中放置了一个别名，该别名对我来说更有意义，因此我可以记住它，并且键入的次数更少：

trans-unit.source: I ended up with: $ git remote show -n origin, which seems to be fastest. With -n it will not fetch remote heads (AKA branches). You don't need that type of info, right?
trans-unit.target: 我最后得到了： $ git remote show -n origin ，这似乎是最快的。 使用 -n 时 ，将不会获取远程头（AKA分支）。 您不需要这种类型的信息，对吗？

trans-unit.source: I prefer this one as it is easier to remember:
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢这个,因为它更容易记住。

trans-unit.source: I pulled a project from GitHub a few days ago. I've since discovered that there are several forks on GitHub, and I neglected to note which one I took originally. How can I determine which of those forks I pulled?
trans-unit.target: 几天前,我从GitHub上调出了一个项目。后来我发现GitHub上有好几个叉子,而我忽略了我最初拔取的是哪一个。如何确定我拔出的是哪一个叉子?

trans-unit.source: I think you can find it under .git/config and remote["origin"] if you didn't manipulate that.
trans-unit.target: 我认为，如果您不进行操作，则可以在 .git/config 和 remote["origin"] 下找到它。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the name of the upstream remote for a branch, you can look that up first by inspecting the upstream branch name that the current branch was built upon. Use git rev-parse like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果您不知道分支的上游远程名称，则可以通过检查当前分支所基于的上游分支名称来首先查找。 像这样使用 git rev-parse ：

trans-unit.source: If you extend this alias like this
trans-unit.target: 如果你像这样扩展这个别名

trans-unit.source: If you require full output and you are on a network that can reach the remote repo where the origin resides :
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要完整的输出，并且您所在的网络可以到达源所在的远程仓库：

trans-unit.source: If you require pure speed, then use:
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要纯粹的速度,那么使用。

trans-unit.source: If you want only the remote URL, or if your are not connected to a network that can reach the remote repo:
trans-unit.target: 如果你只想要远程URL,或者如果你的网络没有连接到一个可以到达远程的repo。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the value in the script, you would use the first command listed in this answer.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使用脚本中的值,你会使用这个答案中列出的第一个命令。

trans-unit.source: If you'll need this command often, you could define an alias in your .bashrc or .bash_profile with MacOS.
trans-unit.target: 如果经常需要此命令，则可以使用MacOS在 .bashrc 或 .bash_profile 中定义一个别名。

trans-unit.source: It will list all useful information such as:
trans-unit.target: 它将列出所有有用的信息,如:

trans-unit.source: It will print all your remotes' fetch/push URLs.
trans-unit.target: 它将打印出你所有遥控器的fetchpush URL。

trans-unit.source: It works for Git Bash command console or CMD command console in Windows. That said, it works with version 2.x of Git.
trans-unit.target: 它适用于Windows中的Git Bash命令控制台或CMD命令控制台。也就是说,它可以在Git 2.x版本的Git中工作。

trans-unit.source: Note: This will work even if you are offline or the remote git server has been taken down.
trans-unit.target: 注意:即使在离线或远程git服务器被关闭的情况下,这个功能也能发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: Now it should be noted, that this is not necessarily the same as the source remote repository that was cloned from. In many cases however it will be enough.
trans-unit.target: 现在需要注意的是,这不一定和克隆的源远程仓库是一样的。但在很多情况下,这就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Now take that and pipe it to git ls-remote and you'll get the URL of the upstream remote that is the source of the current branch:
trans-unit.target: 现在，将其传送到 git ls-remote ，您将获得作为当前分支源的上游远程站点的URL：

trans-unit.source: On Mac you could call open $(giturl) to open the URL in the standard browser.
trans-unit.target: 在Mac上，您可以调用 open $(giturl) 在标准浏览器中打开URL。

trans-unit.source: Or chrome $(giturl) to open it with the Chrome browser on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 或 chrome $(giturl) 以在Linux上的Chrome浏览器中将其打开。

trans-unit.target: Or:

trans-unit.target: Output:

trans-unit.target: 打印任意命名的远程提取URL。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the URLs for a remote.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个远程的URL。

trans-unit.source: See commit 96f78d3 (16 Sep 2015) by Ben Boeckel (mathstuf).
trans-unit.target: 参见Ben mathstuf （ mathstuf ）的 commit 96f78d3 （2015年9月16日） 。

trans-unit.source: Short answer:
trans-unit.target: 简短的答案是:

trans-unit.source: Should you want this for scripting purposes, you can get only the URL with
trans-unit.target: 如果你想用这个来编写脚本,你可以只用下面的URL来获取

trans-unit.source: So you just need to call giturl in the Git root folder in order to simply obtain its URL.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您只需要在Git根文件夹中调用 giturl 即可简单地获取其URL。

trans-unit.source: Some info:
trans-unit.target: 一些信息。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to @Jefromi for pointing that out.
trans-unit.target: 感谢@Jefromi指出这一点。

trans-unit.source: The Git URL will be inside the Git configuration file. The value corresponds to the key url.
trans-unit.target: Git URL将在Git配置文件中。 该值对应于键 url 。

trans-unit.source: The upstream's remote may not be called "origin", so here's a variation:
trans-unit.target: 上游的远程不一定叫 "原点",这里有一个变种。

trans-unit.source: This command will give all information related to your repository.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令将提供所有与你的存储库相关的信息。

trans-unit.source: This is better than reading the configuration; refer to the man page for git-ls-remote:
trans-unit.target: 这比阅读配置要好。 请参考手册页 git-ls-remote ：

trans-unit.source: This shows that upstream branch that was the source for the current branch. This can be parsed to get the remote name like this:
trans-unit.target: 这显示了当前分支的源头上游分支。这可以被解析成这样的远程名称。

trans-unit.source: To edit:
trans-unit.target: 要编辑:

trans-unit.source: To get the IP address/hostname of origin
trans-unit.target: 获取来源的IP地址/主机名

trans-unit.source: To get the answer:
trans-unit.target: 为了得到答案。

trans-unit.source: To summarize, there are at least four ways:
trans-unit.target: 概括起来,至少有四种方式。

trans-unit.source: To supplement the other answers: If the remote has for some reason been changed and so doesn't reflect the original origin, the very first entry in the reflog (i.e. the last entry displayed by the command git reflog) should indicate where the repo was originally cloned from.
trans-unit.target: 作为其他答案的补充：如果由于某种原因更改了遥控器，但未反映原始来源，则reflog中的第一个条目（即 git reflog 命令显示的最后一个条目）应指示存储库在哪里最初是从中克隆的。

trans-unit.source: Usage:
trans-unit.target: Usage:

trans-unit.source: When using git clone (from GitHub, or any source repository for that matter) the default name for the source of the clone is "origin". Using git remote show will display the information about this remote name. The first few lines should show:
trans-unit.target: 当使用 git clone （来自GitHub或任何源代码仓库）时，克隆源的默认名称为“ origin”。 使用 git remote show 将显示有关此远程名称的信息。 前几行应显示：

trans-unit.source: With '--all', all URLs for the remote will be listed.
trans-unit.target: 使用' --all '，将列出遥控器的所有URL。

trans-unit.source: With '--push', push URLs are queried rather than fetch URLs.
trans-unit.target: 使用' --push '，将查询推送URL，而不是获取URL。

trans-unit.source: With git remote show origin you have to be in the projects directory. But if you want to determine the URLs from anywhere else you could use:
trans-unit.target: 使用 git remote show origin ,您必须位于projects目录中。 但是，如果要从其他任何地方确定URL，可以使用：

trans-unit.source: With Git 2.7 (release January 5th, 2015), you have a more coherent solution using git remote:
trans-unit.target: 使用Git 2.7（2015年1月5日发布），您可以使用 git remote 获得更一致的解决方案：

trans-unit.source: You can add to your profile with: alias s='git remote -v && git status'
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用以下方式将其添加到个人资料： alias s='git remote -v && git status'

trans-unit.source: You can apply | grep -i fetch to all three versions to show only the fetch URL.
trans-unit.target: 您可以申请 | grep -i fetch grep -i提取所有三个版本以仅显示提取URL。

trans-unit.source: You can try:
trans-unit.target: 你可以试试。

trans-unit.target: 希望对你有帮助

trans-unit.target: 如果你连上了网络

trans-unit.target: 会显示本地 Git 仓库的 URL,它将显示本地 Git 仓库最初被克隆的 URL。

trans-unit.source: or, an alternative for pure quick scripts:
trans-unit.target: 或者,纯快速脚本的替代方案。

trans-unit.source: remote: add get-url subcommand
trans-unit.target: 远程:添加get-url子命令

trans-unit.source: url=http://example.com/repo.git
trans-unit.target: url=http://example.com/repo.git

trans-unit.target: 你在使用中得到更多的可能性。
